lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under the new plan, introduced in line with Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev's drive to modernise the economy, special inspectors have the right to reject goods they consider below standard.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The promotion of the cooperative and private sectors of the economy has been an important part of the modernisation campaign, with measures introduced recently to allow the setting up of small shops on a private basis.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But western economists said they treat Soviet productivity figures with caution, as they are more broadly based than in the West, which measures worker output over a given period.
